overview: In the year 43 AD, Claudius  reigns over the Roman Empire with his beautiful wife, Messalina, at his side.  Messalina is a sex-obsessed woman who mercilessly exploits her husband's power in an attempt to satisfy her insatiable lust. Actively supported by Agrippina, Messalina turns the Roman court into a squalid place of vice and perversion. One day, however, the Emperor finds out what is going on behind his back and takes cruel revenge.
title: Messalina
